description:
The story revolves around Eto-shin. "Eto-shin" are the 12 divine messengers chosen from "Eto-musume," or zodiac girls representing all kinds of animals. From ancient times, these 12 divine messengers have protected the land of the rising sun. They are powerful beings who have survived through "ETM 12," a divine tournament held every sixty years, and admired by all Eto-musumes.

Fast forward to now, the present day, and the year ETM 12 will be held. From all over Japan, Eto-shin candidates, or in other words, Eto-musumes gather in great numbers.

Within that group exists a single cat Eto-musume.

Her name is Nya-tan. She is thought of as the one closest to becoming an Eto-shin, but is a misfortunate girl who always ends up undermined by evil rodents.

The only way to become the 12 zodiac signs is to beat all the Eto-shins. However, the power of the Eto-shins is so great, and no Eto-musume has ever won in the tournament for the past two thousand years.

When Nya-tan meets an ordinary high school boy, Takeru Amato, the story begins!

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/01_chan)

He graduated from Yoyogi Animation school and joined Studio Junio afterwards. After leaving Studio Junio, he became a freelancer and often works with Studio Sunrise and GONZO.
In 2008, him and former GONZO producer Ikeda Touyo founded Encourage Films Co., Ltd, with a capital of 5 million yen.
Ikeda Touyo would serve as the representative director and president of Encourage Films. 
With the death of Ikeda Touyo, on February 17, 2013, he was appointed as the representative director and CEO of Encourage Films.

__Associated Names:__ Poyoyon Rock (ぽよよんろっく), Poyoyon♥Rock (ぽよよん♥ろっく), Pucchin Purin

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/punipoyo)

A Japanese animator, character designer, and animation director currently living in Tokyo, Japan. He often goes by the pseudonym Poyoyon Rock.  He is also a member of the doujinshi circle Pokopii.  

(Source: Wikipedia)

node.description:
QP:flapper is an illustrator unit conformed by the illustrators Tometa Ohara and Koharu Sakura.

[Twitter (Tometa Ohara's Account)](https://twitter.com/tometa_qp) | [Twitter (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://twitter.com/pimopimo) | [Pixiv (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10538) | [Blog (Tometa Ohara's Blog)](http://tometa.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Blog (Koharu Sakura's Blog)](http://pimeco.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Official Website](http://qp.banbi.net/)

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/white_ramutara)

**Ide Kazuya (井出和哉)** is a Japanese producer.

Ikeda Touyou was born March 10, 1974 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an animation producer and president and representative director of Encourage Films.

Ikeda was influenced by Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon and decided to go into animation. After majoring from college he joined the Yoyogi Animation Gakuin. After graduating he barely made a living at first and wasn't able to join a company until he was picked up by the newly established Digimation. After Digimation merged with Gonzo he continued to work for Gonzo Digimation and subsequently after the renaming back to its old name for Gonzo.

He was a producer at Gonzo, until he left in 2007 to become independent. He later established animation production company Encourage Films with the aim to produce happy animation for and together with fans, without any restrictions and boundaries, which was also the reason for the company's name. The establishment of the company together with animation supervisor and character designer Oizaki Fumitoshi was announced at the Phoenix Birth Event, related to Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - Layla Hamilton Monogatari, by Loft Plus on August 10, 2008 in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan.

He married on May 13, 2007. The wedding reception was done by voice actress Oohara Sayaka who had previously done the voice of Layla Hamilton in Kaleido Star, a series he produced for Gonzo.
Youko Kogawa is a Japanese producer and planner working at Pony Canyon.
**Umezawa Junichi (梅澤純一)** is a Japanese animator and prop designer.
